backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining client management types, access control, user profiles, and CRUD/query logic with onboarding, KYC, and activity log support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend modifications: reworked PDF download utility and filename generation update in ClientDetailPage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each major frontend file’s purpose across routing, pages, components, onboarding, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions providing color tokens, radius, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gating, and route definitions for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout with sidebar navigation, user profile display, and logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Login screen rendering Internet Identity login flow with loading state.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientAc: Parses and displays client activity log entries in a table, showing recent changes first.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientId: Renders identity documents, KYC screening history, and current risk assessment sections for a client.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientOv: Displays editable or read-only client overview fields using mock and client data, including contact and identity details.
frontend/src/components/clients/CurrentR: Shows overall risk level, risk factors, and review dates with styling and an action button for new screening.
frontend/src/components/clients/Identity: Lists identity documents with verification status, metadata, and expiry status indicators.
frontend/src/components/clients/KycScree: Displays a table of past KYC screenings with risk results, PEP/sanctions checks, and notes.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/EditO: Dialog component for editing and moving an onboarding card, handling form state, date conversion, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Displays a client card with status, assignee, due date, and opens the edit dialog.
Builds a normalized six‑column kanban board and renders each onboarding stage with its cards.
Renders a single kanban column with a header and a list of client cards for that stage.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/onboa: Defines the ordered list of onboarding stages and helpers for stage lookup by name or number.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new users to enter and save their name and email before proceeding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/clear actions, and initializes AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, clients, onboarding data, and activity logs.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/mocks/clientDetailMock.ts: Defines a mock client detail interface and generates deterministic mock KYC/identity details with alerts and screening history.
frontend/src/mocks/clientsListMock.ts: Provides a static list of mock ClientProfile entries with high IDs and preset personal and KYC fields.
frontend/src/pages/AddClientPage.tsx: Implements a form to create new clients, validating input and saving via backend or local fallback.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed client information with tabs, mock detail data, editing support, overrides, activity logs, and PDF export.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, sortable client list combining backend, mock, and local clients with navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page displaying client statistics and upcoming KYC review deadlines using query hooks and cards.
frontend/src/pages/KYCScreeningPage.tsx: Simple page showing a header for managing KYC screening and related checks.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Onboarding pipeline page fetching pipeline data and rendering a kanban board with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Reports page with a header describing available compliance and risk reports.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page providing a header for configuring application preferences.
frontend/src/utils/clientActivityLog.ts: LocalStorage-based utility for loading, appending, and clearing per-client activity log entries.
frontend/src/utils/clientOverrides.ts: Utility for storing, loading, and clearing per-client field overrides in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/clientPdfExport.ts: Generates structured client PDF content by assembling profile and mock data into predefined sections.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting utilities for dates, timestamps, IDs, labels, and expiry status calculations.
frontend/src/utils/localClients.ts: Manages locally stored clients, including ID generation, save/load, and updates with bigint handling.
frontend/src/utils/pdfDownload.ts: Provides helpers for sanitizing filenames and printing HTML content to PDF through a popup window.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based routes), storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and syncing URL values to persistent session state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout settings with custom theme tokens and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the CRM project's current state, architecture notes, known issues, and planned features for the Swiss-style financial advisory application.
